original_text: This is what the Lord said to me: “Go and stand at the Gate of the People, through which the kings of Judah go in and out; stand also at all the other gates of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 여호와께서 내게 이와 같이 말씀하시되 너는 가서 유다 왕들이 출입하는 평민의 문과 예루살렘 모든 문에 서서

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord said to me:
Go and stand at the Gate of the People,
through which the kings of Judah go in and out;
stand also at all the other gates of Jerusalem.
